description.english: Defeated the attacking Meteora on the surface.
description.french: Vaincre le Meteora ayant attaqué la surface.
description.german: Besiege den Meteora, der die Oberfläche angegriffen hat
description.japanese: 地上に襲来したメテオラを撃破した
description.schinese: 击破袭击地表殒星兽

description.english: Defeated the Meteora that killed Coco.
description.french: Vaincre l'assassin de Coco.
description.german: Besiege den Meteora, der Coco tötete
description.japanese: コーコのかたきのメテオラを撃破した
description.schinese: 击破害死了洸子的殒星兽

description.english: Viewed the "Astray from the Polaris" ending.
description.french: Voir la fin "Astray from the Polaris (Loin de l'étoile polaire)".
description.german: Viewed the "Astray from the Polaris" ending.
description.japanese: エンディング『Astray from the Polaris』を見た
description.schinese: 看过结局《Astray from the Polaris》（偏离星轨）

description.english: Shot by traitorous Deiter.
description.french: Se faire trahir et tirer dessus par Deiter.
description.german: Werde von Deiter verraten und erschossen
description.japanese: デイターの裏切りにあい撃たれた
description.schinese: 惨遭戴特背叛后被枪杀

description.english: Analyzed the attacking Meteora on the surface.
description.french: Analyser le Meteora ayant attaqué la surface.
description.german: Analysiere den Meteora, der die Oberfläche angegriffen hat
description.japanese: 地上に襲来したメテオラを解析した
description.schinese: 解析袭击地表殒星兽

description.english: Attended Noa's night concert.
description.french: Assister au concert nocturne de Noa.
description.german: Besuche Noas Nachtkonzert
description.japanese: ノアのナイトライブに参加した
description.schinese: 出席诺娅的夜间演唱会

description.english: Analyzed the Meteora that killed Coco.
description.french: Analyser l'assassin de Coco.
description.german: Analysiere den Meteora, der Coco tötete
description.japanese: コーコのかたきのメテオラを解析した
description.schinese: 解析害死了洸子的殒星兽

description.english: Started exploring the surface.
description.french: Se lancer dans l'exploration de la surface.
description.german: Beginne mit der Erkundung auf der Oberfläche
description.japanese: 地上の探索を開始した
description.schinese: 开始探索地表

description.english: Fought alongside the Meteora with Coco's form.
description.french: S'allier au Meteora ayant les traits de Coco.
description.german: Kämpfe mit dem Meteora, der Cocos Gestalt angenommen hat
description.japanese: コーコの姿をしたメテオラと共闘した
description.schinese: 与酷似洸子的共斗

description.english: Began researching the Unique Meteora Anima.
description.french: Se lancer dans les recherches sur Anima, Type-U.
description.german: Beginne mit der Untersuchung an der besonderen Meteora-Form "Anima"
description.japanese: メテオラ特殊個体「アニマ」の調査を開始した
description.schinese: 开始调查殒星兽特殊个体“阿尼玛”

description.english: Attended Noa's impromptu concert.
description.french: Assister au concert surprise de Noa.
description.german: Besuche Noas Überraschungskonzert
description.japanese: ノアのゲリラライブに参加した
description.schinese: 出席诺娅的突发演唱会

description.english: Decided to continue researching the Unique Meteora Anima.
description.french: Décider de poursuivre les recherches sur Anima, Type-U.
description.german: Entscheide dich, die Untersuchungen an der besonderen Meteora-Form "Anima" fortzusetzen
description.japanese: メテオラ特殊個体「アニマ」の調査続行が決まった
description.schinese: 决定继续调查殒星兽特殊个体“阿尼玛”

description.english: Defeated Yamato in battle.
description.french: Vaincre Yamato.
description.german: Gewinne im Kampf gegen Yamato
description.japanese: ヤマトとの戦闘に勝利した
description.schinese: 战胜大和

description.english: Viewed the "The Celestial Cradle" ending.

description.japanese: エンディング『The Celestial Cradle』を見た
description.schinese: 看过结局《The Celestial Cradle》（星空摇篮）

description.english: Conspired with Noa about the elimination of the Unique Meteora Anima.
description.french: Parler en secret à Noa de l'élimination d'Anima, Type-U.
description.german: Spreche mit Noa über die Eliminierung der besonderen Meteora-Form "Anima"
description.japanese: メテオラ特殊個体「アニマ」の排除について、ノアと密談した
description.schinese: 与诺娅进行密谈，商讨除掉殒星兽特殊个体“阿尼玛”

description.english: Viewed the "The Fairy's Ark" ending.

description.schinese: 看过结局《The Fairy's Ark》（精灵方舟）

description.english: Defeated the mysterious being.

description.japanese: メテオラ特殊個体「アニマ」との交流を深めた

description.english: Witnessed Noa and Anima's resonance.
description.french: Assister à la synchronisation entre Anima et Noa.

description.japanese: アニマとノアの共鳴を目撃した
description.schinese: 目睹了阿尼玛与诺娅的共鸣

description.english: Defeated Noa in battle.
description.french: Vaincre Noa.
description.german: Gewinne im Kampf gegen Noa
description.japanese: ノアとの戦闘に勝利した
description.schinese: 战胜诺娅
